instructions: Participants completed a questionnaire with 35 person description items (34 used in analysis). For each item, they categorized themselves and estimated the percentage of 'college students in general' in that category.

items.question: With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Shy (not shy)
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Optimistic (not)
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Supporter of women's lib (not)
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Brown (white) bread
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Italian (French) movies

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Subscribe (don't) to magazines on list provided
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Hometown more (less) than 200,000
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Think about dying? yes (no)

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Difficulty controlling temper? yes (no)
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Frequently depressed? yes (no)
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Emotional needs satisfied? yes (no)

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Better financial status than parent? yes (no)
With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Death before 70th birthday? yes (no)

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Woman in Supreme Court within decade? yes (no)

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Poverty problem reduced in next 20 years? yes (no)

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Nuclear weapon used in warfare in next 20 years? yes (no)

With respect to the following category, how would you describe yourself and what percentage of your peers do you estimate fit into the first category? Category: Discovery of extraterrestrial life by year 2000? yes (no)
